availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Tell Henry (Nicholas County, KY, cabinet maker)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, cabinet maker. Kentucky native. Son of Richard D. Henry. and Rhoda Ogden Henry. Married to Nancy T. Hall Henry in Nicholas County on November 8, 1855. Father of Elizabeth Henry and Fanny Henry. Cabinet maker in Nicholas County in 1850. Cabinet maker in Nicholas County in 1860. Undertaker in Nicholas County in 1863. Provost marshal of Nicholas County. Member of Republican party. Member of Presbyterian Church.
